pages.text:
Contact Us
We’d love to hear from you! Whether you’re planning a special event, looking to book our meeting space, or have questions about our catering services, reach out today. Our team at Velchoff’s Corner is here to make every occasion exceptional—from casual get-togethers to grand celebrations. Give us a call or send us a message, and we’ll get back to you as soon as possible. We can’t wait to help you create memorable moments at Velchoff’s Corner!
DonnaFeibelman@gmail.com
P: 386.385.2365

donnafeibelman@gmail.com
P: 386.385.2365

Who we are
Velchoff’s Corner is more than a restaurant—it's a welcoming haven for those craving authentic Southern comfort food, fresh seafood, and classic Cajun flavors. Located in the heart of Palatka, Florida, our mission is to bring families, friends, and the local community together over hearty meals and genuine hospitality.
We take pride in using premium ingredients and regional recipes that capture the rich tapestry of American cuisine. Our approach is simple: combine bold flavors, friendly service, and a cozy atmosphere to create a dining experience worth remembering. Whether you join us for our signature oysters, a comforting Cajun dish, or just a sweet treat and coffee, we’re dedicated to making you feel right at home.
At Velchoff’s Corner, everyone’s invited to pull up a chair, savor great food, and create new memories. We believe that sharing a meal isn’t just about satisfying your appetite—it’s about coming together and celebrating life’s everyday moments, big or small. See what makes Velchoff’s Corner a place you’ll want to visit time and time again.
Begin Your Journey
Our Menus

Catering, Special Events, & Rental Space
Looking for the perfect spot to host your next unforgettable gathering? Velchoff’s Corner offers a cozy and inviting space for everything from birthday celebrations to corporate meetings. Our flexible event area can be arranged to fit your needs, and our team is dedicated to ensuring every detail runs smoothly. Whether you’re planning an intimate get-together or a large-scale party, we’ll help you create a memorable experience—complete with our delicious menu options and signature Southern hospitality. Stay tuned for more details, or reach out to learn how Velchoff’s Corner can bring your special event to life!
